channel.title: Can anyone help me add/delete items from shops.Make item reqs. And
channel.description:
I need help doing the following...
-Adding and removing items from shops. -Editing prices of items in shops. -Making level reqs for some items. -Making it so you get some items when you reach a certain level i.g. When a player get 99 strength, They will have a strength skillcape appear in their inventory.

I was joking btw Delta… I know your an awesome coder -.-

Read full topic

item.title: Can anyone help me add/delete items from shops.Make item reqs. And
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

-Adding and removing items from shops. shops.cfg.
-Editing prices of items in shops. item.cfg.
-Making level reqs for some items. wear boolean.
-Making it so you get some items when you reach a certain level i.g. When a player get 99 strength, They will have a strength skillcape appear in their inventory. in the levelup method: if(playerLevel[skill] == 99) { addItem(1031, 1); sendMessage("Congratulations on getting 99 strength!"); }

Read full topic
